common.description: Essential developer tools, code sharing, forum, and community — all in one platform.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.description: Format, validate & minify JSON with syntax highlighting
jsonFormatter.inputSubtitle: Paste or type your JSON here

regexTester.title: Regex Tester
regexTester.description: Test regular expressions with real-time match highlighting

base64Encoder.title: Base64 / URL Encoder
base64Encoder.description: Encode & decode Base64 and URL strings instantly

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert between HEX, RGB & HSL with palette generation

uuidGenerator.title: UUID & Hash Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Generate UUIDs and compute SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 hashes

jwtDecoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwtDecoder.description: Decode JSON Web Tokens and inspect header, payload & expiry
jwtDecoder.tokenSubtitle: Paste your JSON Web Token below

timestampConverter.title: Timestamp Converter
timestampConverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates

tools.saveHistoryHint: When on, your tool usage is saved so you can revisit it later.
tools.noHistory: No history yet. Use tools to see them here.
tools.loginToSave: Sign in to save your tool history

loremGenerator.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremGenerator.description: Generate placeholder text in paragraphs, sentences or words
loremGenerator.startClassic: Start with "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..."

hero.subtitle: Share code, showcase projects, level up your career, and connect with developers worldwide.

features.title: Everything developers need
features.subtitle: One platform to share, learn, and grow together.

codeSharing.title: Code Sharing & Snippets
codeSharing.description: Share code snippets with syntax highlighting for 50+ languages. Discuss, fork, and learn from other developers' code.

blog.title: Developer Blog
blog.description: Write technical articles with a powerful Markdown editor. Share your knowledge and build your audience.

showcase.title: Project Showcase
showcase.description: Showcase your projects with screenshots, tech stack tags, and live demo links. Build your developer portfolio.

xp.title: XP & Level System
xp.description: Earn XP for every contribution. Level up from Bronze to Legendary and climb the global leaderboard.

notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
notifications.description: Stay in the loop with instant notifications for likes, comments, follows, and level-ups.

search.title: Global Search
search.description: Find developers, posts, and topics instantly with Cmd+K powered search across the entire platform.

codePreview.label: Share Code
codePreview.title: Beautiful syntax highlighting for every language
codePreview.description: Paste your code, choose a language, add a description, and share with the community. It's that simple.

leaderboard.label: Level Up
leaderboard.title: Earn XP. Climb the ranks. Get recognized.
leaderboard.description: Every post, comment, and connection earns you XP. Rise through six tiers — from Bronze to Legendary — and prove yourself on the global leaderboard.

community.title: Join the community
community.subtitle: Developers from around the world are already here.

cta.title: Ready to join the developer community?
cta.subtitle: Start sharing code, building your portfolio, and connecting with developers today.

footer.tagline: The social platform built for developers.
footer.madeWith: Built with ❤️ by developers, for developers.

empty.postsDescription: When {name} shares something, it will appear here.
empty.bookmarksDescription: Posts you bookmark will appear here.

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.usernameHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.

settings.profileLoadError: Profile could not be loaded. Try signing out and back in, or contact support if the issue persists.

account.title: Account
account.description: Manage your account credentials and data.
account.passwordHint: Use a strong password to keep your account secure.
account.changePasswordDesc: Enter a new password for your account.
account.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
account.deleteAccountHint: Permanently delete your account and all your data.
account.deleteWarning: All your posts, snippets, and profile data will be permanently removed.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize how CommitCamp looks and feels.

settings.allowPrivateMessagesHint: Others can message you via Discord when this is on.
settings.connectDiscordHint: Link your Discord to receive messages from other developers.

notif.title: Notifications
notif.description: Choose which notifications you want to receive.
notif.likesHint: Get notified when someone likes your post.
notif.commentsHint: Get notified when someone comments on your post.
notif.followsHint: Get notified when someone follows you.
notif.levelUpHint: Get notified when you reach a new level.

messages.subtitle: Message other developers via Discord.
messages.noConversationsDesc: Turn on “Allow private messages” in Settings and connect your Discord. Then visit a profile and click Message to open Discord.
messages.noMessages: No messages yet. Send the first one!

feed.subtitle: See what developers you follow are sharing.
feed.filterLabel: Show all or only people you follow
feed.emptyDesc: Follow other developers to see their posts and snippets here.

forum.subtitle: Discussions, questions, and project showcases.
forum.viewSwitcherLabel: Switch between grid and list view
forum.noPosts: No posts yet. Start a discussion!
forum.title: Title
forum.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to reply!
forum.loginToComment: Sign in to leave a comment.
forum.notFoundDesc: This post may have been deleted or doesn't exist.

reports.title: Report content
reports.description: Help us moderate content by sharing why this should be reviewed.

snippets.title: Code Snippets
snippets.subtitle: Browse and share code snippets with the community.
snippets.noSnippets: No snippets yet. Be the first to share a code snippet!
snippets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this snippet?
snippets.notFoundDesc: This snippet may have been deleted or doesn't exist.

legal.termsAcceptText: By using CommitCamp you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, do not use the service.
legal.termsServiceText: CommitCamp provides developer tools, code sharing, forum, and community features. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time.
legal.termsUseText: You must use the service lawfully and not abuse, harm, or spam other users. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
legal.termsContactText: For questions about these terms, contact us via the platform or the repository.
legal.privacyCollectText: We collect account data (email, username, profile) when you sign up, and usage data necessary to run the service. Developer tools run in your browser; input is not sent to our servers.
legal.privacyUseText: We use your data to provide the service, authenticate you, and improve the platform. We do not sell your personal data.
legal.privacyDiscordText: If you connect Discord for messaging, we store your Discord user id and username to link your profile. Messaging happens on Discord; we do not store message content.
legal.privacyRightsText: You can access, correct, or delete your data via Settings. You may disconnect Discord at any time.
legal.privacyContactText: For privacy questions, contact us via the platform or the repository.
legal.verifyDesc: This page is used for Discord Linked Roles. Sign in to CommitCamp and complete verification if required by a server.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyDescription: When someone interacts with your content, you'll see it here.

leaderboard.subtitle: Top developers ranked by XP, posts, and reactions
leaderboard.emptyDesc: Start creating posts and earning XP to appear here.

search.emptyDescription: Try different keywords or check the spelling.

ai.title: AI Assistant

usage.title: Daily Usage
usage.limitReached: Daily limit reached. Try again tomorrow.

errors.rateLimited: You've reached your daily limit. Try again tomorrow!
errors.modelError: AI model is temporarily unavailable. Switching to fallback...
errors.unauthorized: Please sign in to use the AI assistant.

ai.welcomeTitle: How can I help you code today?
ai.welcomeSubtitle: I can write code, explain concepts, debug errors, review code, and convert between languages.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Track your progress and earn badges
achievements.noAchievementsDescription: Start posting, commenting, and connecting to earn badges!
